channel.title: mi8-Blog
channel.description: Enterprise solutions for a Digital world

item.title: Comment créé un post ?
item.description:
COMMENT CREE UN POST DANS LE BLOG MI8 ?

Avant toutes choses créé une nouvelle branche sur Github. Vous avez la posibilité de travail en local pour cela il vous faudrait installer Jekyll Serve
Lien tuto

item.title: Layout Post
item.description: Here you can see the basic post. No fancy type, no setting and the featured image is just embedded into the content. The front matter for that basic post just consists of the basic tags, author, title, featimg, tags and category

item.title: Create Post
item.description: Here you can see the basic post. No fancy type, no setting and the featured image is just embedded into the content. The front matter for that basic post just consists of the basic tags, author, title, featimg, tags and category

item.title: Standard Post
item.description: Here you can see the basic post. No fancy type, no setting and the featured image is just embedded into the content.

item.title: YouTube
item.description: This is a youtube post type video.

item.title: Audio
item.description: This audio post is displays without a material-sidebar and has the iframe set for the index pages, instead of a featured image.

item.title: Image
item.description: Here you see an image post in the standard layout, with material-sidebar.

item.title: Gallery
item.description: Here you’ll find a simple gallery, that just adds all of the images at full-width directly in the post content.

item.title: Full Width Post
item.description: a standard post displayed at full-width, only requires a layout, variable. The featured image will be added at the beginning of the content, but not above it, as in an image post.

item.title: YouTube full
item.description: This youtube video uses the iframe instead of the thumbnail image on the index pages.

item.title: Audio Full
item.description: This audio post is displays without a material-sidebar and has a featured image set for the index pages.

item.title: Image Full
item.description: Here you see an image post with a full-width layout.

item.title: Gallery Alternative
item.description: An alternative to the simple gallery would be this version, which displays the post ins a lightbox. The setup basically is the same, the include makes all the difference.

item.title: Vimeo
item.description: this is a video post using the vimeo format.
